data.lyric:
[ti:Martin & Gina (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Martin & Gina (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:00.52]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett/Tahj Vaughn/Kyre Trask/Hagan Lange
[00:01.04]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett/Tahj Vaughn/Kyre Trask/Hagan Lange
[00:01.56]Tahj Money
[00:02.78]
[00:07.18]I bet my last track probably gave you lockjaw hey Lilkdubb
[00:09.41]Then I can't wait 'till I get home to f**k the s**t out of you
[00:14.45]Even on your worst days girl you're still kind of cute
[00:16.85]If it go down I'm gonna protect you pull that stick out and shoot
[00:19.51]All I want is your love I can't see no b***h after you
[00:22.08]Of our motions we did things that we didn't have to do
[00:24.44]Scared of you leaving I told lies when you asked for the truth
[00:27.00]I second guessed if you the one that's when I didn't' have a clue
[00:29.74]Martin Gina but we ain't think about behind the scenes
[00:32.82]The way I kill it she lose her voice when she tryin' to scream
[00:35.36]We from the trenches we moved onto the finer things
[00:37.91]Now you done went from HM to a designer fiend
[00:40.26]He was playing games got you dancing in the middle of the club
[00:43.13]Got you dancing in the middle of the club
[00:45.33]I know what you chasing you can only get this feeling from a thug
[00:48.24]You can only get this feeling from a thug
[00:50.08]Tears falling and it's liquour in your cup all you really want is love
[00:53.66]Baby all your really want is love
[00:55.61]Only talk to bosses independent can't be f**king with a scrub
[00:58.45]Girl I know you can't be f**king with a scrub
[01:00.28]I get this feeling in my stomach when you next to me
[01:02.55]Man I'm tryna get to know you sexually
[01:04.61]Talk you on shopping sprees for therapy
[01:07.79]Take care of me
[01:08.90]I know sometimes I'm crazy I was hoping that you could bear with me
[01:11.54]Beauty and the beast pretty girl with a gangster
[01:13.80]I swear you still the baddest in the room with no makeup
[01:16.62]You the type of woman every hood n***a pray for
[01:18.57]I vow to stay a 100 never change up
[01:21.63]In a sundress d**n your body so amazing
[01:23.65]Love the way you smell I'm addicted to your fragrance
[01:26.36]It's somethin' about you but I really can't explain it
[01:28.59]Just know that you mine I tell that n***a he can just save it
[01:31.31]He was playing games got you dancing in the middle of the club
[01:34.19]Got you dancing in the middle of the club
[01:36.40]I know what you chasing you can only get this feeling from a thug
[01:39.31]You can only get this feeling from a thug
[01:41.15]Tears falling and it's liquour in your cup all you really want is love
[01:44.73]Baby all your really want is love
[01:46.68]Only talk to bosses independent can't be f**king with a scrub
[01:49.52]Girl I know you can't be f**king with a scrub
data.trans:
[ti:Martin & Gina (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.52]//
[00:01.04]//
[00:01.56]Tahj Money制作
[00:02.78]
[00:07.18]我上一首歌让你很惊艳吧 Lilkdubb制作
[00:09.41]我等不及回家和你激情缠绵了
[00:14.45]就算在你最不堪的时候 姑娘 你依然很可爱
[00:16.85]如果遇到麻烦 我会保护你 掏出枪来射击
[00:19.51]我只想要你的爱 我觉得任何女人都比不上你
[00:22.08]不顾一切 我们做了一些不必要做的事情
[00:24.44]害怕你会离去 在你要我说真话的时候 我说了假话
[00:27.00]我曾怀疑过你是不是我的真爱 那时候 我还什么都不明白
[00:29.74]就像Martin和Gina 但我们不会思考背后的那些琐事
[00:32.82]我的魅力 让她声嘶力竭地尖叫起来
[00:35.36]我们来自贫民区 我们已经拥有了更好的生活
[00:37.91]现在你已经不再购买平价服装 而是追求名牌产品
[00:40.26]他在和你闹着玩 让你在夜店中央跳着舞
[00:43.13]让你在舞池中央跳着舞
[00:45.33]我知道你在追寻什么 你只能从街头大哥这里体会到这种感觉
[00:48.24]你只能从街头大哥这里体会到这种感觉
[00:50.08]眼泪滑落 你端着酒杯 你想要的只是爱
[00:53.66]宝贝 你想要的只是爱
[00:55.61]只和有钱人说话 独立自主 不愿搭理小喽啰
[00:58.45]姑娘 我知道你不愿搭理小喽啰
[01:00.28]当你在我身边时 我心中有一种感觉
[01:02.55]天哪 我想要了解你那方面的兴趣
[01:04.61]带你去疯狂购物 疗愈心中的伤
[01:07.79]照顾我
[01:08.90]我知道有时候我很疯狂 我希望你能忍受我
[01:11.54]美女与野兽 漂亮姑娘和匪帮大哥
[01:13.80]我发誓 就算你不化妆 依然是最美的那一个
[01:16.62]你就是每个街头小子梦寐以求的女人
[01:18.57]我发誓 我会对你真心真意 绝不会改变
[01:21.63]穿着太阳裙 天哪 你的身体好迷人
[01:23.65]喜欢你身上的味道 我迷恋着你的香水味
[01:26.36]你有一种特别的魅力 但我真的无法解释
[01:28.59]我知道你属于我 我告诉那个男人 别白费力气了
[01:31.31]他在和你闹着玩 让你在夜店中央跳着舞
[01:34.19]让你在舞池中央跳着舞
[01:36.40]我知道你在追寻什么 你只能从街头大哥这里体会到这种感觉
[01:39.31]你只能从街头大哥这里体会到这种感觉
[01:41.15]眼泪滑落 你端着酒杯 你想要的只是爱
[01:44.73]宝贝 你想要的只是爱
[01:46.68]只和有钱人说话 独立自主 不愿搭理小喽啰
[01:49.52]姑娘 我知道你不愿搭理小喽啰
